</div>

</li><li id="cmsms_icon_list_item_6400e3fd810f04_53257813" class="cmsms_icon_list_item">
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_item_inner">
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_icon_wrap">
<span class="cmsms_icon_list_icon cmsms-icon-edit-2"></span>
</div>
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_item_content">
<h4 class="cmsms_icon_list_item_title">Direct or Indirect Filling </h4>
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_item_text">
<p>While filling the cavity doctors can use inlay or onlay fillings to fill the area properly to prevent the diseases to attack again</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</li><li id="cmsms_icon_list_item_6400e3fd811171_16917833" class="cmsms_icon_list_item">
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_item_inner">
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_icon_wrap">
<span class="cmsms_icon_list_icon cmsms-icon-edit-2"></span>
</div>
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_item_content">
<h4 class="cmsms_icon_list_item_title">Schedule the Next Visit</h4>
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_item_text">
<p>You will be given a schedule to visit for checkup. Our doctors will checkup the oral health on each visit and monitor the progress of treatment.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</li></ul>
</div>
<div class="cmsms_column one_half llm_wd_right_b_box">

<div id="cmsms_heading_6400e3fd811e92_49539499" class="cmsms_heading_wrap cmsms_heading_align_center">
	<h1 class="cmsms_heading llm_wd_list_text">TIPS FOR DENTAL FILLING</h1>
</div> 
<ul id="cmsms_icon_list_items_6400e3fd812189_61503637" class="cmsms_icon_list_items cmsms_icon_list_type_block cmsms_icon_list_pos_left cmsms_color_type_border llm_wd_list_text"><li id="cmsms_icon_list_item_6400e3fd812570_33530112" class="cmsms_icon_list_item">
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_item_inner">
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_icon_wrap">
<span class="cmsms_icon_list_icon cmsms-icon-check-3"></span>
</div>
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_item_content">
<h4 class="cmsms_icon_list_item_title">Food and Drinks after Filling</h4>
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_item_text">
<p>Be restrained to hot meals, coffee, tea, sticky items, solid and chewy</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</li><li id="cmsms_icon_list_item_6400e3fd812854_05381548" class="cmsms_icon_list_item">
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_item_inner">
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_icon_wrap">
<span class="cmsms_icon_list_icon cmsms-icon-check-3"></span>
</div>
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_item_content">
<h4 class="cmsms_icon_list_item_title">Maintain the Oral Hygiene</h4>
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_item_text">
<p>Maintain the oral hygiene after meal and use brush and floss</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</li><li id="cmsms_icon_list_item_6400e3fd812ac1_76965682" class="cmsms_icon_list_item">
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_item_inner">
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_icon_wrap">
<span class="cmsms_icon_list_icon cmsms-icon-check-3"></span>
</div>
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_item_content">
<h4 class="cmsms_icon_list_item_title">Sensitivity</h4>
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_item_text">
<p>You may feel sensitivity right after filling for few days to weeks.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</li><li id="cmsms_icon_list_item_6400e3fd812d10_65459517" class="cmsms_icon_list_item">
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_item_inner">
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_icon_wrap">
<span class="cmsms_icon_list_icon cmsms-icon-check-3"></span>
</div>
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_item_content">
<h4 class="cmsms_icon_list_item_title">Teeth Brush </h4>
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_item_text">
<p>Use appropriate brush and paste to clean the teeth after every meal.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</li><li id="cmsms_icon_list_item_6400e3fd812f47_32403181" class="cmsms_icon_list_item">
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_item_inner">
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_icon_wrap">
<span class="cmsms_icon_list_icon cmsms-icon-check-3"></span>
</div>
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_item_content">
<h4 class="cmsms_icon_list_item_title">Feel Discomfort</h4>
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_item_text">
<p>Contact immediately If you feel discomfort or having any other serious problem</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</li></ul>
</div>

</div>
